rules.name: Picklist_NOT_Validated
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9)
rules.label: Picklist NOT Validated

rules.name: true_3rd_picklist_empty
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6) AND 7
rules.label: true 3rd picklist empty
